channel.title: Will be Sponsered. Run-Escape
channel.description:
[center][b][size=12pt]Launch: 09/12/12[/size][/b][/center]
People I am currently interested in: Dalton59, RandQm
[center]Run-Escape[/center]
VPS specs: [size=8pt]13.0ghz processor 13GB RAM 260GB Storage 3250GB Bandwidth Company: Vpsland
Some Server features: Revision: 317 Pi Basics(Stand out): Fire-making completely clipped, npcs completely clipped, Castle wars completely done, everything works skill wise, all minigames no dupes, modes when starting a character, depending on mode i.e. easy or hard is the skill xp and what you can get in shops; also the modes required one highscores per each mode, and i have already decided to have one world per mode each mode gets three worlds, in 2009 xurses was one of the first to connect two worlds together, and some of this team is from that group, achievements, GE maps where added and look/work perfect, made for a skilling/pk server, donator items are nontraditional or only they can wield and no rares will be seen ingame until this Halloween, which a few easter egg surprises will be added for each holiday only once though, by Halloween we expect to have at least 100 players online because of our sponsors. after the year 2013 is over people will only see regular holiday events (yes, i ripped the idea off from runescape). so this is the year to join. [/size]
Job Positions : [size=8pt][Website]HTML, PHP, SQL Coder: Open [Highscores, Voting etc] Java, xammp Coder: Open [Server Side] Java Coder: Emtrescue [Client Side] Java Coder: Open Banner/Design Artist: Open Manager: Blaze[/size]
Staff: Owner: Taharahora Admin: Cody Mod: Mentalherox, Open
Base Starting with: Fire RsPs.
Sponsors to come: [size=8pt]Moparscape google RsPs Agency[/size]
[size=8pt]What you will need: Msn, Microphone, Knowledge of what you are doing and free time. Know how to use a CRM and look for weekly updates on what you are needed for.
Staff: There is no spawning no master and no pure for staff. you only get one chance, no trolling or flamming you are staff; look the other way. Be ready to handle 25+ people the first day of launch.
Coders: You get a title on forums and ingame, no powers. including myself.
Pictures: None yet this is just getting started.[/size]
Private Message me with this filled out:
[code]Postion Wanted:
Skills/Knowledge of position(You will be tested so don't lie.):
Background check(show some of your work):
Are you at least 18 years of age?:
Will you be willing to prove your age?:
Msn:
Time zone:
Times you are on Msn: [/code]
[size=8pt]If accepted I will Message you on Msn and before handing out the VPS information you still have to use either TV or Join Me so I can test you on your knowledge.
All in all this is an opportunity that doesn't come around to often, I will be willing to settle for a newish coder that knows only simple stuff and is a quick learner, in general I can do a lot of the stuff but I am working so need some backbone for the server so it sees weekly updates and keeps players coming..[/size]

item.title: Will be Sponsered. Run-Escape
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

PM it to me. And I have just started college for the fall semester so my replies might be lagging.

EDIT: if you don’t hear back within a week means I am not interested. But also consider I am a busy person. I will update the staff list with the names I have chosen; and Msn them in my free time.

Read full topic

item.title: Will be Sponsered. Run-Escape
item.dc:creator: @Mister_Master Mister Master
item.description:
@Mister_Master wrote:

Postion Wanted: Administrator

Skills/Knowledge of position(You will be tested so don’t lie.): I was a moderator on Dodian and actually ran my own server back in the day with almost 40+ players online at the max. These are not related to my position, but provide you with some knowledge on my past.

Background check(show some of your work): Well Dodian got shutdown, but there is a website that a lot of Dodian players went to after it shutdown and is owned by some of the players. As far as my server goes, that was made years ago, so again, no proof on that as well.

Are you at least 18 years of age?: Yes

Will you be willing to prove your age?: Yes

Msn: masterlop21@hotmail.com

Time zone: -5 GMT

Times you are on Msn: I’ll be on most of the time

Read full topic

item.title: Will be Sponsered. Run-Escape
item.dc:creator: @Mystic-Effect Mystic-Effect
item.description:
@Mystic-Effect wrote:

Postion Wanted: Server And Client Sided

Skills/Knowledge of position(You will be tested so don’t lie.): Java Work Amazing With PI skill 7/10

Background check(show some of your work): Exodian, Eluminous

Are you at least 18 years of age?: Im only 15 But I Have Amazing Java Skills.

Will you be willing to prove your age?: Im 15 Almost 16

Msn: ilovepking123@hotmail.com

Time zone: Eastern

Times you are on Msn: All Day Er Day

SOME EXTRA INFO: im THEEBOSS on rune-server

Read full topic

item.description:
@TheToxic wrote:

You should have received a message from me now, talk to you later.

Read full topic

item.title: Will be Sponsered. Run-Escape
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

Postion Wanted: Moderator/Banner Designer

Skills/Knowledge of position(You will be tested so don’t lie.): Atm im Moderator of OldRune (1900 Registered forum members) and got asked for Artisticy (75 players)

Background check(show some of your work): Writing this from my ipod, so cant show you any of mywork, will post this later.

Are you at least 18 years of age?: no im actually 16, but you dont have to be 18 to have ‘skills’

Will you be willing to prove your age?: if you tell me how, sure.

Msn: Dutchreality317@hotmail.com

Time zone: Amsterdam (+1)

Times you are on Msn: Always lol

Read full topic

Interesting enough I suppose, good luck with the development or whatever, the way you have this worded is rather confusing, nonetheless I comprehend the best bits of it.

item.title: Will be Sponsered. Run-Escape
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

[quote=“pokemonn, post:2, topic:455655”]Postion Wanted: website development

Skills/Knowledge of position(You will be tested so don’t lie.): a couple of years

Background check(show some of your work): 2006redone.co.cc

Are you at least 18 years of age?: No

Will you be willing to prove your age?: i’m 15?

Msn: *****

Time zone: Belgium

Times you are on Msn: most of the day![/quote]

Denied. Read. I said private message me if you can’t even read it all and skip steps; wonder how you’d do coding skipping steps like that.

EDIT: can a mod edit out his MSN from this post. Main reason I said Private message me is because not many people want their MSN hanging around. Lunch time. I will check my messages in a few.

Read full topic

item.title: Will be Sponsered. Run-Escape

Background check(show some of your work): 2006redone.co.cc
